column4: Question - When I goto:  System > Admin > Printing > then under my printer properties, under Driver tab, I have what appears to be names of drivers (and one of it is gutenprint, which matches what was suggested at openprinting.org) my question is, would selecting that from the list okay? or do I need to install it manually by clicking on Install Driver button next to the list?
Just selecting is fine, install is for if/when you have a custom driver.
